post.body: I would say i work about 65ish hours a week but i am a cfo and starting my own business at the same time so not that bad
good call dawn! but you need to do some more yoga when you get back...from the crowds ive seen! merry christmas!
when is your live stream normally held?
are you from dayton? i grew up around there!
where are you flying from? travel can be crazy these days!
do you seriously make your own creams and lotions? thats impressive! what kind do you make?
i hope not because i just had some tonight...so i guess at least we will be in it together!
thank for the welcome! looking forward to connecting...twittering in the future...feel free to follow me! later!
You think Henson would be better than Seuss? Puppet Man vs. Rhyme-a-Holic!
which one did you get?
Great stuff Guy! Keep it coming!
I love Mat Kearney...great man! Love to listen while designing!
Where in the world are you?! I just heard ur interview on Mixergy: http://blog.mixergy.com/business-nomad Awesome! Nice to Meet you!
yeah yeah...i know your bragging!!! and 4lbs...you need to share!!!
it says you are just like the rest of us except you have LICORICE!!!
yuck messing with code...glad it was you!
No but after I grow it this year I will sell it in 2010! YEAH!
do you make money through generating traffic? through ads?
no what is Bukisa?
Dont worry Brooke actually Chicago is moving well now...actually I will be there this even too! Have a safe trip.
im watching are you actually there?!?!?!?!
I dont know yet...because of travel plans Santa will come to our house tomorrow...what did you get?
ah that sucks!!!! so sorry to hear that...i hope 2009 is better!
isnt the honesty of kids just wonderful?!?!?! Merry Christmas
and you need to get his new book...i read it on a couple flights and it was fantastic!!!!!
seriously the best videos i have seen in a while you MUST check it out http://tinyurl.com/6mluo8
is going to get cheese sticks...yeah they make you fat...so what!!! :)
contemplating why it is he lives in Wisconsin...got 14" of snow last night http://www.todaystmj4.com/news/local/36368724.html
is thinking about a new blog called ContextThis. How many of you use iStockphoto.com?
Just hanging reading design/presentation blogs while my youngest tries to bite my nose!
has just listened to 150+ audio tracks to find the perfect one for his customers project. I like to us http://www.shockwave-sound.com/
wondering what software people use to make kinetic type movies
Ok all..."Context This Blog" is TAKING OFF!!! You better get in on the ground floor!!! http://contextthis.wordpress.com/
im getting used to my new black rimmed Club Monoaco glasses http://www.clubmonaco.com/122008/default.asp
The newest Context This post http://tinyurl.com/9c9zma
Just got accepted as a beta tester for prezi a non-linear presentation software. This will be awesome! http://prezi.com/
This blog will work best if u use ur own creativity & add ur two cents or a whole dollar for all I care!!! http://contextthis.wordpress.com/
Ok NEW BLOG ALERT!!! Here it is world the celebration of the relationship between context and visuals http://contextthis.wordpress.com/
I'm working on a new blog...a little different will require some creativity of its "readers" but I think it could be a lot of fun!
Kickstart UR Blog Community w/ Facebook Connecthttp://tinyurl.com/6kzwns
